main event: An airman observed a white spherical object with a white trail at Lackland AFB, Texas, on April 9, 1952.
interesting points: The object traveled from SSE to NW at a high rate of speed,The observation lasted 1-2 seconds,The object appeared to be the size of an ordinary marble,The sighting coincided with the takeoff of a C-97 from a nearby airbase,The observer was alone in his barracks when he sighted the object.
sighted object: white spherical object with a white trail
